mapper.select: select r.review_idx, r.product_idx, r.user_id, r.review_content, r.review_img, r.review_score, r.review_rgstdate, m.user_name from review r inner join member m on r.user_id = m.user_id where product_idx = #{product_idx}
mapper.update: update review set review_content = #{review_content}, review_img = #{review_img}, review_score = #{review_score} where review_idx = #{review_idx} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from review where review_idx = #{review_idx} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select user_id from review where review_idx = #{review_idx}
